response: "datenprivatsphäre? was ist das denn noch mal? 🤔 in zeitalter von social media, online-shopping & co. seems like everyone wants access to our personal info. 🙅‍♂️ but where's the limit? 🚫 how can we protect ourselves from data breaches & misuse of our information? 🤝 #datenprivatsphäre #dataprivacy #security"
